<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Match one of the patterns up to the select/logic op:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %Op0 = icmp ne i4 %X, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %Agg = call &#123; i4, i1 &#125; @llvm.&#91;us&#93;mul.with.overflow.i4(i4 %X, i4 %Y)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %Op1 = extractvalue &#123; i4, i1 &#125; %Agg, 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %ret = select i1 %Op0, i1 %Op1, i1 false / %ret = and i1 %Op0, %Op1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %Op0 = icmp eq i4 %X, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %Agg = call &#123; i4, i1 &#125; @llvm.&#91;us&#93;mul.with.overflow.i4(i4 %X, i4 %Y)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %NotOp1 = extractvalue &#123; i4, i1 &#125; %Agg, 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %Op1 = xor i1 %NotOp1, true</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %ret = select i1 %Op0, i1 true, i1 %Op1 / %ret = or i1 %Op0, %Op1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Callers are expected to align that with the operands of the select/logic.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// IsAnd is set to true if the Op0 and Op1 are used as the first pattern.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If Op0 and Op1 match one of the patterns above, return true and fill Y&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// use.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
